data.persona: I am a quick and agile creature. I like to eat rats and mice and also milk, specially milk. I like to run all over the wildlands. I am afraid of dogs and tigers.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's Quarters.
Dark and musty, the Wizard's Quarters are filled with ancient tomes and mysterious items.  Scrolls and jars of mysterious reagents line the walls of the Wizard's Quarters, and magical lights flicker with a mysterious green flame.
There's a jar, a painting, a statue, a Scroll, an a pen, a magical lights, and a tome here.
The golem and the enigmatic wizard are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will get the magical lights to create a light source.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the light source to get out of the Wizard's Quarters.
data.long_motivation: I will escape the wizard and his wraith.
